text:
Landslip (Wynyard) Amendment Order 2008

On the recommendation of the Director of Mines, I make the following order under section 161D(1)(b) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

29 July 2008

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Landslip (Wynyard) Amendment Order 2008 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the thirtieth day after the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Landslip (Wynyard) Order 1975 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Landslip (Wynyard) Order 1975 .

5.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Landslip (Wynyard) Order 1975 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 6 August 2008

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
